name: Baristar
description:
BARISTAR

The card-playing, resource-managing, customer-serving coffee shop experience!

Play cards, earn cash, upgrade your tools, amend your deck.

TUTORIAL TO COME

Controls:

Click to select up to two cards (unless you play a modifying card, e.g. Teamwork). Submit your choices to advance by 30 minutes and complete your selected activities. Your energy for each round is displayed on the board (and is represented by the food in the counter).

You can right-click a card to see more detail, or you can sacrifice the card and gain it's energy cost back as energy. This will remove it from your deck completely.

Each day is 12 hours long, mouse over the clock to see how many rounds you have left to play.

NOTES:
  • You can only serve customers if you have prepared coffee for them.
  • Tips are based on the store rating, which is determined by cleanliness and atmosphere.
  • There is much to come, see devlogs for further info.
